TopicTitle: how fast can you make contact with the muns surface from liftoff

Articles.Content:
Rules:

NO mods or file edits.

that being said see how fast you can get your kerbals to hit the mun surface.

note: they dont have to live.

my record: 50 minutes 40 seconds at 8303.3m/s
Wow, you guys are getting there much faster than I can! What\'s your secret?

challenge accepted and beaten

48:26 with only original parts ( KSP v0.15.2)

nothing has been modified or edit

damn... nearly reched the mun at nearly 35 minutes but i made a 'small navigation' mistake ;D

but i\'ll do it tomorrow under 35 minutes ... i need to optimize the rocket slightly

g8 @ all ( 1:08 am in berlin )

Interesting challenge! I managed to get to the Mun in only 29:59, and I even got a screenshot of the impact! Poor Jeb

WOW my laptop didn\'t like this challenge. After impact KSP used up 3.1 gigs of RAM (out of 4) and the camera flew straight through the Mun as if my craft hadn\'t crashed!

I have a rocket that can go atleast 9400 m/s IIRC, but seeing what happened to my computer, I won\'t be attempting the challenge with it ???
nice job guys I am going to have to try to beat some of your records tonight hmmm maybe my voyager rocket can be used in this situation.

34:25

I know I can do better, but I doubt I\'ll be able to beat 30:00 with the rocket I used.

from about a month ago...

00:35:55, intact, returnable vessel 8)
